cms.query.QueryText: WITH usedCategories AS ( SELECT * FROM CMS_SettingsCategory WHERE CategoryID IN (SELECT KeyCategoryID FROM CMS_SettingsKey WHERE ISNULL(KeyIsHidden, 0) = 0) UNION ALL SELECT CMS_SettingsCategory.* FROM CMS_SettingsCategory JOIN usedCategories ON CMS_SettingsCategory.CategoryID = usedCategories.CategoryParentID ) SELECT DISTINCT * FROM usedCategories WHERE CategoryIsGroup = 0 ORDER BY CategoryLevel, CategoryOrder OPTION(MAXRECURSION 100)
